title: Something Animal
description: After witnessing his sister's brutal murder, Jack struggles to cope with the disturbing, psychological aftermath. Tormented by images of the attack, Jack is forced to confront the harsh reality that either his sanity is quickly crumbling or that he is turning into something else... something dark... something animal...Something Animal is Fanboy Comics' first graphic novel. Written by Sam Rhodes and Bryant Dillon, it contains 80 pages of full-color art by Robert Burrows.Printed by James River Press www.jamesriverpress.comThe cover of Something Animal was printed on 120# silk cover. It was printed 4 color process plus a flood satin aqueous coating. The text pages were printed 4 color process on 80# gloss text. Both cover and text were printed at 175 line screen.
author: Sam Rhodes
